--- Full Notice Text --- LEGAL ADVERTISEMENT OSCEOLA COUNTY BOARD OF COUNTY COMMISSIONERS PROJECTS: 1) ITB-26-15384-PC Buenaventura Lake Internal Drainage Improvement CDBG-MIT-Funded Project (Grant #MT044). Funds have been awarded by the Florida Department of Commerce / Reference Federal Register Notice (84 FR 45838, 8/30/2019). The solicitation document and any addenda may be accessed and downloaded from VendorLink at the following web address: Vendorlink.osceola.org. There will be a VIRTUAL NON-MANDATORY PRE-PROPOSAL CONFERENCE via the Microsoft TEAMS application held on Tuesday, November 11, 2025, at 10:00 AM Local Time. Dial in at 407-906-2344, and when prompted, enter the following conference code: 178 928 560#.Please note the meeting will be audio recorded. The deadline for questions is Wednesday, November 19, 2025, at 2:00 PM Local Time. DUE DATE: Tuesday, December 9, 2025, at 2:00 PM Local Time. Contact: Paul Callaway (407) 742-0932. FOR MORE INFORMATION, VISIT OSCEOLA COUNTYS VENDORLINK WEB SITE AT http://vendorlink.osceola.org. November 6, 2025

item.title: Miscellaneous Notices - Kissimmee
item.description:
Notice at 211 E
Meeting: Friday, November 21, 2025 at 12:00 PM Location: 211 E
--- Full Notice Text --- LEGAL ADVERTISEMENT OSCEOLA COUNTY BOARD OF COUNTY COMMISSIONERS PROJECTS: 1) ITB-26-15457-PC / Replacement of Commercial Split-System HVAC Units at the Osceola County Hart Memorial Central Library A CDBG Funded Project (Grant No. B-20-UW-12-0020).A Non-Mandatory On-Site Pre-Bid Conference will be held on Thursday, October 30, 2025, at 10:00 A.M. Local Time at the Hart Memorial Central Library, located at 211 E. Dakin Ave., Kissimmee, Florida 34741. Meeting will begin inside the Library Lillie Conference Room. The meeting will be audio recorded. Deadline for questions: Friday, November 7, 2025, at 12:00 P.M. Local Time. Due Date for bids: Tuesday, November 18, 2025, at 2:00 P.M. Local Time. Contact: Paul Callaway, 407-742-0932. 2) RFLOI-26-15540-RR - Request for Letters of Interest to Purchase 4.61 +/- Acres of Real Property for Development. Deadline for questions is Friday, November 21, 2025 at 12:00 PM Local Time. Due Date: Tuesday, December 2, 2025, at 2:00 PM Local Time. Contact: Robert Rosenstein (407) 742-0941. These dates are corrected from previously advertised dates. FOR MORE INFORMATION, VISIT OSCEOLA COUNTYS VENDORLINK WEB SITE AT http://vendorlink.osceola.org. October 23, 2025

item.title: Government Publications - Notices of Hearings - Orlando
item.description:
NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARINGNotice is hereby given that Public Hearings will be held by the Osceola County Board of County Commissioners beginning at 1...
--- Full Notice Text --- NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARINGNotice is hereby given that Public Hearings will be held by the Osceola County Board of County Commissioners beginning at 1:30 P.M. or as soon thereafter as practical, on November 3, 2025, in the Osceola County Administration Building, Commission Chambers, 4th Floor, 1 Courthouse Square, Kissimmee, Florida, to consider the following: Adoption of Resolution #25-124R for VAC25-0009: Adoption of Resolution #25-124R vacating a portion of a portion of existing right of way of Osceola Polk Road, Grant Street, Ray Street, Lanier Street, Pound Street and Clay Street as shown on the Plat of Walkers Loughman Addition, according to the Plat thereof, as recorded in Plat Book 1, Page 338, Public Records of Osceola County, Florida, containing approximately 3.96 Acres +/- and is generally located west of State Road 17 aka South Orange Blossom Trail, east of Old Tampa Highway, North of Church Road and South of Ivy Mist Lane in Section 6, Township 26 South, Range 28 East, Florida, Commission District: 1 BCC Date 11-03-25 Materials relating to the above may be examined in the offices of the Osceola County Community Development, 1 Courthouse Square, Suite 1100, Kissimmee, Florida 34741, between 8:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m., weekdays except holidays. Written comments may be submitted to the Community Development Department at the above address.For questions regarding these requests please contact the Osceola County Community Development Department at 407-742-0200; fax number at 407-742-0206 or email at notice@osceola.org. Interested parties may appear at the public hearing and be heard with respect to these items. Any person wishing to provide documents for review at a public hearing must submit them to notice@osceola.org prior to the meeting or bring copies of the documents to distribute to the County Commissioners. No outside removable devices will be accepted at the hearing. Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) & Title VI Assistance The Osceola Board of County Commissioners ensures meaningful access to County programs, services, and activities to comply with Civil Rights Title VI and Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act. Individuals with disabilities requiring accommodations (i.e., sign language interpreter or materials in accessible format) or individuals with Limited English Proficiency requiring language interpreters to participate in County sponsored meetings, please contact the Countys ADA/Title VI Coordinator, at (407) 742-1200 (TTY Users Dial:711 for the Florida Relay System) or ADA.Coordinator@osceola.org, at least four (4) days prior to the meeting or event. Ley de Estadounidenses con Discapacidades (ADA) y Asistencia del Ttulo VI La Junta de Comisionados del Condado Osceola garantiza un acceso significativo a los programas, servicios y actividades del Condado para cumplir con los Derechos Civiles Ttulo VI y Ttulo II de la Ley de Estadounidenses con Discapacidades. Las personas con discapacidades que requieran adaptaciones (es decir, intrprete de lenguaje de seas o materiales en formato accesible) o las personas con dominio limitado del ingls que requieran intrpretes de idiomas para participar en reuniones patrocinadas por el condado, comunquese con el coordinador de ADA/Ttulo VI del condado al (407) 742-1200 (Usuarios de TTY marcar: 711 para el Sistema de retransmisin de Florida) o ADA.Coordinator@osceola.org, al menos cuatro (4) das antes de la reunin o evento. 10/20/2025 7885812

--- Full Notice Text --- OSCEOLA COUNTY BOARD OF COUNTY COMMISSIONERS PROJECTS: 1. ITB-26-15457-PC / Replacement of Commercial Split-System HVAC Units at the Osceola County Hart Memorial Central Library A CDBG Funded Project (Grant No. B-20-UW-12-0020). A Non-Mandatory On-Site Pre-Bid Conference will be held on Thursday, October 30, 2025, at 10:00 A.M. Local Time at the Hart Memorial Central Library, located at 211 E. Dakin Ave., Kissimmee, Florida 34741. Meeting will begin inside the Library Lillie Conference Room. The meeting will be audio recorded. Deadline for questions: Friday, November 7, 2025, at 12:00 P.M. Local Time. Due Date for bids: Tuesday, November 18, 2025, at 2:00 P.M. Local Time. Contact: Paul Callaway, 407-742-0932. 2. RFLOI-26-15540-RR - Request for Letters of Interest to Purchase 4.61 +/- Acres of Real Property for Development. Deadline for questions is Friday, November 21, 2025 at 12:00 PM Local Time. Due Date: Tuesday, December 2, 2025, at 2:00 PM Local Time. Contact: Robert Rosenstein (407) 742-0941. These dates are corrected from previously advertised dates.
